summary: Adds carriages to Morthal, Winterhold, and Falkreath!
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  ~  Purpose:  ~

•  If you\'re like me and don\'t bother using the vanilla Fast Travel ability, but find it tedious to trek across the vast countryside of Skyrim on foot or horseback and rely on the carriage system to go long distances, then you too might be upset about the lack of carriages in cities like Morthal, Falkreath, and Winterhold.

•  Well no longer must you suffer! This simple mod adds a working carriage to all three aforementioned cities, to allow easy travel between cities.

•  Important note: This is my first real work with the Creation Kit, so there are bound to be errors and slip-ups.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  ~  Mod features:  ~

•  A carriage in Morthal, Winterhold, and Falkreath

•  A custom driver NPC for each carriage

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  ~  Known bugs:  ~

•  The horses may wander off, get stuck, or get in the way of NPC\'s. The carriages may also get in the way of NPC\'s.

•  The Falkreath carriage driver\'s face is a different color than his skin, this is a CK error that I can\'t fix.

•  The wheels of the carriages clip into the ground, this is a minor error that isn\'t a large concern of mine.

	• If you encounter any other problems, please leave a comment and I will try to help. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  ~  (In)compatibility:  ~

•  This mod MAY conflict with any mods that alter the cities, such as the TAVE series, but I haven\'t tested any.

•  The Scenic Carriages mod MAY or MAY NOT work, again I have not tested it as I do not personally use it.

•  Inconsequential NPCs is not supported, so the added carriages will not have guards as the others would.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  ~  Installation:  ~

•  Take the enclosed .esp and drop into your SteamApps>common>Skyrim>Data

•  Activate in the Skyrim Launcher

•  Recommended to wait one in-game day before using the carriages, but it shouldn\'t be necessary.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  ~  Uninstallation:  ~
•Deactivate or remove the .esp
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: SnippyTheDeliveryFox
